text: 11:25,26Mt 6:14,15Nami ktaiyü üng ua khana pi mlung am jenak nami tak üng mhlät ua. Acunüng nami Pa, khankhawa ka naw nangmia katnak pi ning jah mhlät khai” a ti. 11:25-26 Cangcim khawjah naw hina 26 am yuk si u. 26 khyanga katnak am nami mhlät üng khankhawa awmkia nami pa naw nangmia katnak pi am ning jah mhlät khai ni” a ti.
